tool_description: An unofficial tool for Mobile Legends that allows users to query all available heroes and their roles.

api_list.name: Role name
api_list.description: Returns all heroes associated with a specific role.

required_parameters.name: name
required_parameters.description: The name of the role to query heroes for.

api_list.name: Roles
api_list.description: Returns a list of all available roles in the game.

api_list.name: Hero detail
api_list.description: Returns detailed information about a specific hero.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The unique ID of the hero. Valid range is between 1 and 115.

api_list.name: Heroes
api_list.description: Returns a list of all heroes available in the game.
